tool_description: Used to verify UPI ID's of users
name: UPI Verification
title: UPI Verification

api_list.name: UPI Verification
api_list.description: Used to verify users UPI ID's
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upi-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_vpa"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upi-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
